item.description:
***Update: The Wine List for the event has been published on the Boston Uncorked site. Tickets remain available. Please note that the actual event begins at 7PM. Try to be at the Back Bay Social Club between 6:45 and 7PM. Each venue is different but food is usually served earlier rather than later since there is plenty of wine to taste. Take the T if possible so you may fully enjoy the event. There is no Red Sox game this night BUT now there is Game 7 Bruins vs Montreal at Garden. Allow for traffic delays.***    

Boston Uncorked is turning SIX this year and is throwing a party to celebrate. Read on if you are ready for another great wine tasting event from Boston Uncorked and purchase your tickets now. The last event sold out again so this one should fill up fast.

 The event will take place from 7:00 - 9:00 PM at The Back Bay Social Club on Boylston Street  in the Back Bay. We will be joined by Tonya's Boston Happy Hour and Cathy's Boston Wine groups.  

Expect an evening of fine food, fine wine and fun.

There will be a selection of fine wines from Bin Ends & Vinodivino!

The fine food will include:

Duck Pastrami with wild mushroom mouse and aged balsamic

Social sliders-mini burger with sharp cheddar and smothered onions

Spanakopita-spinich and feta wrapped in phyllo

Lamb kibble with tzatziki and pita bread

Caesar chicken skewers with rosemary

Smoked salmon on bagel chips with lemon creme and chive

Stuffed pickle peppers-sharp provolone and prosciutto

House made chips with onion herb dip

 

Tickets are $39.00 per person. There are no Maybe RSVPs since you must purchase a ticket in advance.

To purchase your ticket go www.bostonuncorked.com Do not call or contact The Back Bay Social Club.

If you have never attended one of Boston Uncorked events, please check out their web site with photographs and history of past events.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at 6:45PM in the foyer at the Bar & Inside after 7pm
item.why: We do several Uncorked Events every year and members have asked to return.
item.name: Boston Uncorked 6th Anniversary Wine Tasting Party at Back Bay Social Club
